column4: can't he use the "dd" command in order to get the pendrive working? I mean, would "dd if=image.iso of=/dev/pendrive" thing would work or would the boot sectors not be placed properly?
i'm not sure if lucid supports that
the lucid ISO he wants to transfer to the usb you mean? or whether or not lucid supports the "dd" command?
not sure that the lucid livecd supports being written to a usb pendrive using dd (unlike more "intelligent" approaches like the one unetbootin uses)
